title: Mike Van Zee, Special Olympian
description: Meet a courageous and hard-working athlete who is also a Special Olympian. This biography is the story of Mike Van Zee-how he trained, worked with his coach, and became a champion. Readers will also learn about the history of the Special Olympics.
highFrequencyWords: annual, aquatics, competition, determination, excel, gladiators, industrious, involvement, oath, opportunity, perseverance, self-confidence
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Inflectional Endings                : Identify and form words with inflectional endings
awareness: Dictionary Skills                : Use the dictionary to locate and identify word meanings
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
